control.name: KoolAutoComplete - Great PHP Ajax AutoComplete
control.metadescription: KoolAutoComplete is excellent PHP Ajax AutoComplete featuring with flexible rendering, elegant behavior and Ajax Load On-Demand. VIEW DEMO NOW!
control.metakeywords: php ajax autocomplete,ajax autocomplete php, php autocomplete, php ajax autosuggest, php autosuggest, php mysql autocomplete, ajax autocomplete textbox, ajax autocomplete mysql, ajax autocomplete example, php autocomplete dropdown
